stripped_text: You cannot use Tri-maf Contact more than once per turn. click: Gain 2 credits. When Tri-maf Contact is trashed, suffer 3 meat damage.
text:
You cannot use Tri-maf Contact more than once per turn.
[click]: Gain 2[credit].
When Tri-maf Contact is trashed, suffer 3 meat damage.
title: Tri-maf Contact
